mapper.select: SELECT `skill_id` as `skillId`, `user_id` as `userId`, `skill_name` as `skillName`, `experience` as `experience`, `proficiency` as `proficiency` FROM `user_skill` WHERE `user_id` = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user_skill` ( `skill_id`, `user_id`, `skill_name`, `experience`, `proficiency`, `created`, `modified` ) VALUES ( #{skillId}, #{userId}, #{skillName}, #{experience}, #{proficiency}, NOW(), NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `skill_name` = VALUES(`skill_name`), `experience` = VALUES(`experience`), `proficiency` = VALUES(`proficiency`), `modified` = NOW()
